enWisdom: The eye is the scout of the heart (or of temptations)
The eye is the emissary of the heart
Eyes are the informers of the heart
Listen and you will learn; remain silent and you will be safe

Wisdom: جَعَلَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ لَكُمْ أَسْمَاعاً لِتَعِيَ مَا عَنَاهَا وَأَبْصَاراً لِتَجْلُوَ مِنْ عَشَاهَا [مَا عَشَاهَا]
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has granted you with hearing so that it may heed [and comprehend] that which is concerns it and with sight so that what is dark for it may be brought to light [and seen clearly]
One who listens well benefits quickly

Wisdom: الْحَظُّ لِلْإِنْسَانِ فِي الْأُذُنِ لِنَفْسِهِ وَفِي اللِّسَانِ لِغَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: The fortune of a person that comes through the ears is for himself and that which is on the tongue for others
Where are the eyes that glance at the [illuminated] signposts of piety?
The day has dawned for those with two eyes
